com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops

Class ExtractPDFOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.ExtractPDFOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class ExtractPDFOperation
extends Object
implements Operation
    An Operation that extracts pdf elements such as text, images, tables in a structured format from a PDF.

        public ExtractPDFOperation setOptions(ExtractPDFOptions extractPDFOptions)

      • execute

        public FileRef execute(ExecutionContext context)
                throws ServiceApiException,
                       IOException,
                       ServiceUsageException
        Executes this operation synchronously using the supplied context and returns a new FileRef instance for the resulting Zip file.

        The resulting file may be stored in the system temporary directory (per java.io.tmpdir System property). See FileRef for how temporary resources are cleaned up.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface Operation
        Parameters:
        context - the context in which to execute the operation
        Returns:
        the resulting Zip file containing elements information and renditions
        Throws:
        ServiceApiException - if an API call results in an error response
        IOException - if there is an error in reading either the input source or the resulting Zip file
        ServiceUsageException - if service usage limits have been reached or credentials quota has been exhausted.
